conclusion: Violation of P1-1;Remainder inadmissible;Non-pecuniary damage - award
issue: Income Tax Decree no. 13-92 of 26 December 1992 ; Presidential Decree no. 519/94 “On increasing the amount of tax-free monthly income and rates of progressive taxation of citizens’ income” of 13 September 1994 (in force at the material time) ; The Law “On the procedure for payment of taxpayers’ liabilities to budgets and state funds” of 21 December 2000
judges: Ganna Yudkivska;Isabelle Berro-Lefèvre;Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Peer Lorenzen;Rait Maruste
scl: Beyeler v. Italy [GC], no. 33202/96, ECHR 2000-I;Ferrazzini v. Italy [GC], no. 44759/98, ECHR 2001-VII;Iatridis v. Greece [GC], no. 31107/96, ECHR 1999-II;Scordino v. Italy (no. 1) [GC], no. 36813/97, ECHR 2006-V;Špacek s.r.o. v. the Czech Republic, no. 26449/95, 9 November 1999
